content: I've found this construct inside the description of the status {{title}}. it seems like a placeholder for the resource name (OccupationalData). Do I mark it as a problem, or will it be automatically replaced by ODH / OccupationalData? (ODH is used in the rest of the resource descriptions, but it's not the 'title' :)
That's a copy & paste error. That's a legitimate thing to appear in the source for some resources, but not for this resource.
Thanks, I replaced it by ODH for consistency.
